name: Mohammad Iftakher
review: They are very professional. I'd highly recommend them. A Friend of mine told me about them and they really made my moments special. All the best wishes to you guys.

name: Sadia Rind
review: I was searching for a good photographers and videographers in Bangladesh for my Reception event and then i found this company Lovelife Memories. I am so glad to see their team work, passion and sincerity. And happy with the results.

name: Nabila Nawshin
review: They are amazing with their work, service and commitment.  They made our events memorable and special with their great work..!! Keep it up..!!

name: Rajikul Alam
review: Team Lovelife Memories has one of the best photographers. Their Passion for Photography and Creativity makes them one of their kind amongst the rest.Love You Very Much Team Lovelife Memories.

name: Mishu Mahmud
review: Very efficient team, nice work. I recommend them for the event photography.
